attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The public has no confidence in the current government after this latest of several events. 

1. The loss of 2 discs containing personal and financial data on 25 million UK residents. 
2. The further revelation that this same data has routinely been downloaded onto CDs and handed over to non-government agencies since March 2007. 
3. The handling of the Northern Rock crisis. 

We, the undersigned, have lost all confidence in the current government and demand a general election be called.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
